rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports detection status using neutral language.
The segment reports factual detection status ('still has not been detected').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports a positive fact (not detected) but lacks explicit calming language.
'still has not been detected in a domestic Tennessee poultry flock' is a bare negation without explicit calming cues.
